Main - package Main
 
Main - Class in Main
JavaDoc files stored in src folder See below for FUTURE ENHANCEMENT The scheduling management system which allows one to log in, create users, create/update/delete customers and appointments and manage interactions between those classes A feature to consider adding for future iterations of this project could be allowing for better GUI representation for the schedules/calendars along with a mobile version.
